quote_last: , a man came in, wearing a sheepskin coat. He was sucking on a hand-rolled cigarette. The man stuck out his hand, cheerfully. “You’ll be Mister Moon,” he said.
title: The Monarch of the Glen
author: Neil Gaiman

quote_last: “What happened?” Ramirez asked. Helling had alerted him by walkie-talkie and summoned him to the lobby. There the Germans were returning, Henes Sommer covered with blood and being carried by Rudolph Schindler and Peter Maier.
title: Project Cyclops
author: Thomas Hoover
